game.name: Corporate Hell
game.shortDescription: Thank you for your application to Max Potency Inc.! After thorough consideration, we are excited to offer you the position of Junior Chemical Engineer. Master your instruments, encourage your coworkers, and make sure to hit those quotas! Max Potency: Driven by Excellence, Powered by You.

Master your instruments, encourage your coworkers, and make sure to hit those quotas! Max Potency: Driven by Excellence, Powered by You.
